Detailed Description

Adds printing, popup menu, images, columns and items to wxListView.

Allows for sorting on any column.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum wxExListView::wxExImageType

Which images to use.

Enumerator:
IMAGE_ART 

using wxArtProvider

IMAGE_FILE_ICON 

using the wxFileIconsTable

IMAGE_OWN 

use your own images

Member Function Documentation

unsigned int wxExListView::GetArtID ( const wxArtID &  artid)

Returns the index of the bitmap in the image list used by this list view.

If the artid is not yet on the image lists, it is added to the image list. Use only if you setup for IMAGE_ART.

bool wxExListView::SetItemImage ( long  item_number,
const wxArtID &  artid 
) [inline]

Sets the item image, using the image list.

If the listview does not already contain the image, it is added.

void wxExListView::SortColumn ( int  column_no,
wxExSortType  sort_method = SORT_TOGGLE 
)

Sorts on a column.

If you specified use_images, the column that is sorted gets an image (wxART_GO_DOWN or wxART_GO_UP), depending on whether it is sorted ascending or descending. By using wxArtProvider CreateBitmap you can override this image to provide your own one.
